About

LMMS Producers is an independent website created to foster growth and prosperity of the LMMS community. It does not seek profit and is not associated with any company or commercial agenda.

Don’t know what LMMS is? Check it out.

This website uses Free and Open Source technologies, see a brief list of the technologies used:

  • Contrast Theme - Jekyll Theme
  • Jekyll - Static website generator
  • Ruby - Programming Language
  • Nginx - Web Server
  • Linux - Kernel
  • GNU - Fundamental tools and programs
  • Git - Source Code Management
  • Vim - Text Editor
  • Arch - GNU/Linux Distribution
  • And uncountably many others…

We’d like to thank all contributors and developers involved on the hard work to create everything this site is built upon.

Thanks also to Github for free hosting of this site’s source code. You can find it on one of the links in the footer.

Did we miss something? Let us know
